mithuran, sama sewakayin ho pawule samajikayan handuna ganima (munuburan kawurunda yanna amathaka karanna, mithuran aaganthukayan yayi sithanna) sankirna karyayan itu kirima (chek potha thaba ganima, mudal ganan kirima, durakathanaya bhawitha kirima) karadarakari hasirima (aakramanashili bawa) durwala paudgalika saniparakshawa (dath madinna, semin ho nusudusu andum andimata amathaka karanna, snanaya kirimata amathaka karanna) ihatha prakasha walin kisiwak oba athwinda athnam, obata dimenshiyawa ho wenath waidya gatalu athiwime awadanamak athiwime hakiyawak atha.
jathin athara anthawadayakin athi tharamata batakannata siduwu lankika samajayata aagamika anthawadayak awashyara natha.
